properties.name: epay.redisson.model
properties.description: Redisson锁模式,默认为单节点模式(SINGLE)

properties.name: epay.redisson.codec
properties.description: 编码:默认值org.redisson.codec.JsonJacksonCodec

properties.name: epay.redisson.lockWatchdogTimeout
properties.description: 监控锁看门狗，检查锁的超时时间 默认30s

properties.name: epay.redisson.lockModel
properties.description: 锁的模式 如果不设置 单个key默认可重入锁 多个key默认联锁

properties.name: epay.redisson.attemptTimeout
properties.description: 等待加锁超时时间 -1一直等待

properties.name: epay.redisson.dataValidTime
properties.description: 数据缓存时间 默认30分钟(设置时单位为毫秒)

properties.name: epay.redisson.password
properties.description: 密码

properties.name: epay.redisson.enablePsdSign
properties.description: 是否开启密码加密

properties.name: epay.redisson.salt
properties.description: 密码加密盐值(密码加密盐值默认123456)

properties.name: epay.redisson.clientName
properties.description: 客户端名称

properties.name: epay.redisson.pingConnectionInterval
properties.description: Ping 间隔时间 默认1000(毫秒)

properties.name: epay.redisson.connectTimeout
properties.description: 连接超时，单位：毫秒  默认值：10000

properties.name: epay.redisson.timeout
properties.description: 命令等待超时 默认值：3000  单位：毫秒

properties.name: epay.redisson.single.address
properties.description: 单节点redis地址

properties.name: epay.redisson.single.database
properties.description: 数据库编号 默认值：0

properties.name: epay.redisson.single.connectionPoolSize
properties.description: 连接池大小 默认64

properties.name: epay.redisson.single.connectionMinimumIdleSize
properties.description: 最小空闲连接数  默认值：32

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.scanInterval
properties.description: 集群扫描间隔时间

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.readMode
properties.description: 读取操作的负载均衡模式

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.loadBalancer
properties.description: 负载均衡算法类的选择

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.node
properties.description: 节点列表

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.database
properties.description: 哨兵模式,主从

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.masterName
properties.description: 哨兵模式  主服务器的名称

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.slaveConnectionMinimumIdleSize
properties.description: 从节点最小空闲连接数

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.slaveConnectionPoolSize
properties.description: 从节点连接池大小

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.masterConnectionMinimumIdleSize
properties.description: 主节点最小空闲连接数

properties.name: epay.redisson.multiple.masterConnectionPoolSize
properties.description: 主节点连接池大小
